TextView.android:text: For latest information or to report new bugs/ideas, go to https://github.com/spacecowboy/NotePad/issues

- Sync button now requests access and enables syncing instead of opening settings when no syncing has been enabled yet
- Improved scrolling on long notes in the editor
- Added a welcome note for first time users
- Added a welcome note for first time users
- Added option of showing or hiding the note preview when adding a widget to your homescreen
- Added option to show or hide buttons to mark tasks as done in the widget
- Enlarged the touch area for the checkbox in the list. Should make it harder to miss the box now
- Fixed a crash\n- Implemented a receiver for added widget functionality (soon)

- This change log
- Chinese translation
- Removed auto reloading of notes as it would overwrite changes
- Keyboard is opened automatically when creating new notes
- Note titles are now single line but in return a new next-button should appear on your keyboard which will move the cursor directly to the notes field
- Widget title is once again on the left
- Widget items are now smaller at the cost of the note preview field. This means more visible items which has been heavily requested
- Now impossible to delete a list if it is the only list as you could end up in a crash loop when you had no lists
- Completing or moving a note to another list should no longer delete the changes you made if they were not saved. All changes are now saved prior to any action being taken
- Moved the complete button to the overflow menu again as people confused it with a save button
- Various bugs and crashes should be fixed.
